entities.description: The number of offenders involved in a particular incident.
The raw count of cases for each offender number without any statistical weighting.
The percentage representation of each offender number.
The total number of cases observed.
The count of cases with missing data.
Statistical measures including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The type of the variable, in this case, numeric.
The location of the data in the dataset width and decimal points.
The range representing different missing values.

relationships.description: Indicates the raw count of cases for each offender number.
Indicates the percentage representation of each offender number.
Indicates the total number of cases observed in the survey.
Indicates the count of cases with missing data in the survey.
Provides statistical measures including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Indicates the type of the variable, in this case, numeric.
Indicates the location of the data in the dataset width and decimal points.
Indicates the range representing different missing values.
